color.comment: The button tab text color of the currently active tab in Tabbed Navigation.

border-botom.comment: The button tab bottom border of the currently active tab in Tabbed Navigation.

bg-color.comment: The button tab background color of the currently active tab in Tabbed Navigation.

color.comment: The tab button text color in Tabbed Navigation.

bg-color.comment: The tab button background color in Tabbed Navigation.

border-botom.comment: The border on the bottom of the button tabs in Tabbed Navigation.
The border on the bottom of the button tabs on hover in Tabbed Navigation.

color.comment: The button tab text color of the button tabs on hover in Tabbed Navigation.

breakpoint.comment: The breakpoint at which the tabs go from stacked layout to side by side in Tabbed Navigation.
